snippet.title: Circle Empires Tactics - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Circle Empires Tactics now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515260/Circle_Empires_Tactics

Get ready for a new spin on Circle Empires. Predict, plan and attack! Circle Empires Tactics is a simultaneous turn-based strategy game that you can play solo and in multiplayer. Collect resources, use spells and give orders to your troops in the hope that you’ve outsmarted your rivals.

Stay up to date with Circle Empires Tactics and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/CircleEmpires/
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/CircleEmpiresG
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Official website: http://circleempires.com/
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
